Matched Recipients List Token.description:
Display the matched recipients for a given DLP rule for these conditions:
- Recipient is
- Recipient domain is
- Recipient is a member of
- Content is shared from Microsoft 365

Matched Label Name Token.description: Inserts the name of the sensitivity label that was matched

Bold Text.description: Makes the enclosed text bold (Body field only)

Italic Text.description: Makes the enclosed text italic (Body field only)

Underline Text.description: Underlines the enclosed text (Body field only)

Line Break.description: Inserts a line break (Body field only)

Line Break (br).description: Inserts a line break - alternative syntax (Body field only)
